reviewText: I have watched this DVD over and over again.  I still cannot believe the type of stuff going on in here.  Crazy people out there son.  I highly recommend you check it out.
Great gangsta stuff.  Camera was a lil rattled at times.  But this is some of the best gangsta footage ever seen.

This is the first time I've ever seen a DVD of life in the ghettos.  I could not believe what I was watching.  The footage was shocking but I could not stop watching.  One word of caution, this is not for children because of the violence and language.
